RESTAdmin

Class AdminModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmf.module.AbstractModule
      • RESTAdmin.AdminModule

  • public class AdminModule
extends jmf.module.AbstractModule
    Admin Module Class Is the central piece of external administartion of zsdn. Provides a REST interface for message logging, module control and topology. Requires a running CassandraDB instance.
